data.title: PORSCHE 911 GT1 STRASSENVERSION
data.meta_description: Regulations for the GT1 category stipulated that to be eligible, a total of 25 cars must be built for road use. PORSCHE developed two prototype cars, both fully road-legal versions. The first was delivered in early 1996 to the German Federal Ministry of Transport, Building, and Urban Development...
data.text:
This page uses Creative Commons Licensed content from Wikipedia (view authors).

“ Enter the Straßenverse

The Porsche 911 GT1 and the Mercedes-Benz AMG CLK GTR - two legendary street-legal sportscars go head to head in Real Racing! ”

— What's new in this update ( Ferrari Daytona SP3 Update (v11.0)).

“ Limited Series

Earn the Mercedes-Benz AMG CLK GTR Straßenversion, the Porsche 911 GT1 Straßenversion, the McLaren MP4-X, the Jaguar XE SV Project 8, the Porsche 919 Hybrid Evo, and king's ransom of Gold and VP in five all-new Limited Series! ”

— What's new in Ferrari Daytona SP3 Update (v11.0).

“ EXCLUSIVE SERIES

Two iconic Straßenversions make their return alongside the one and only Pagani Huayra R in three brand-new Exclusive Series. Upgrade them fully to unlock! ”

— What's new in this update ( Ferrari Monza SP1 Update (v11.3)).

Regulations for the GT1 category stipulated that to be eligible, a total of 25 cars must be built for road use.

PORSCHE developed two prototype cars, both fully road-legal versions. The first was delivered in early 1996 to the German Federal Ministry of Transport, Building, and Urban Development for compliance testing, which it passed. The second prototype vehicle is in the hands of a Bahrain-based private car collector Khalid Abdul Rahim. These two cars feature 993 style front headlights.

The production car - dubbed 911 GT1 STRAßENVERSION - was a run of approximately 20 units which were built in 1997 and featured 996 style front headlights. The majority of the production model was finished in Arctic Silver or Fern White, but three cars were finished in unique colours: Polar Silver, Indian Red, and Pastel Yellow.

Availability[]

The PORSCHE 911 GT1 STRASSENVERSION is available in 1 series:

Settle it on the Straße bonus series in the Season 2 group.

Porsche 911 GT1 Straßenversion (Exclusive Series) in the Exclusive Series group.

This vehicle was added in the Ferrari Daytona SP3 Update (v11.0) released in December 2022. It is unlocked as soon as Settle it on the Straße is unlocked.

This vehicle can be acquired for 650 or 480 with showcase discount and is delivered instantly. It can sometimes be bought for ?? as a 'Get it Now' price, unlocking Settle it on the Straße.

This vehicle is available to win in the following special event:

Porsche 911 GT1 Straßenversion Limited Series available in the Ferrari Daytona SP3 Update (v11.0) released in December 2022.
